page.title: 10South Duffield - recreation
page.content:
Children in South Duffield are not very pleased with the villagers because they have been refused a {playing field. { There is nowhere to play in South Duffield except the road, and a meeting was held in June 1985 to discuss having a playing field. But villagers voted not to have one, because they all thought it would be near their homes.
If a site could have been found out of the village they would have voted for it. But the only field available is near the centre of the village, and most people voted against it because they did not want the noise and the nuisance, and making a playing field would cost too much.
